title: New Epic skin: Mecha Rengar returns to the hunt

replies.body: Where're my god damn Mecha Zero Sion Chromas?
Well played ! The Mecha Rengar looks like something out of Gundam fighters, looks sick as.
the chroma’s look way better than the normal skin
I want this sooo badly cozz ive just started playing rengar.{{champion:107}}
Hell yeah , as a full skin account, I can not reroll it as 3 randomly  skin{{sticker:darius-angry}}
